name: Bare-Knuckle Sandwich DEMO 2
description:

Bare Knuckle Sandwich is a 2D Punch-Out style fighting game with side-scrolling exploration and a character-driven narrative. BKS tells the story of a young, directionless guy, Gunner, who joins an underground bare-knuckle boxing ring. Follow Gunner as he looks for someone or something to strive towards in a world of con-artists, grifters, and people just trying to get by.

This second demo represents a ~15 minute vertical slice of the game showcasing multiple fights, side-scrolling exploration, dialogue, cutscenes, and more.

**BKS is still in active development and every aspect of the game is subject to change prior to final release.

**Full screen and audio settings are available in the Options menu.

Ben Witt - Direction, Writing, Art, Sound Design, Gameplay Design

Zion Klinger - Engineering (Gameplay and Systems), Gameplay Design, Editing

Music by TortureWorld and Kevin MacLeod
